title: Assistant, Post Production-  Live Action
overview: The Assistant, Post Production- Live Action position is responsible for supporting the Post Production Managers and Coordinators in managing pre-production, principle photography, editorial, picture and sound finishing, and deliverables for Japanese live-action contents shot and finished throughout Japan, while also learning all aspects of the post-production process at Netflix.
description:
We are seeking to bring on a Post Production Assistant  based in Japan to help manage both internal and third party co-productions from a post perspective with both scripted and unscripted series. The Post Production team is responsible for supervising all aspects of production with our Japan Content team. The Assistant will support the Post Production Managers and Coordinators who will manage the titles from the beginning until the launch.  The production phases that the Assistant will support  will be pre-production, principle photography, editorial, picture and sound finishing, including consolidating deliverables. 

The Role
This is an entry level role for someone who has always been fascinated about the post production process film/series creation and is deeply passionate to develop a career in the field and learn the cutting-edge post process at Netflix. A successful candidate will be self-motivated, proactive, assertive, diplomatic in communication, quick-thinking, flexible and able to juggle multiple and diverse responsibilities with a strong emphasis on organization and unwavering attention to detail at all times while working closely with the cross functional teams. 

This is a demanding and fast-moving position that requires someone who is a proactive and positive thinker, and able to exercise good judgment and initiatives. The role will be focused on supporting Japanese live-action contents that are shot and finished throughout Japan.  


Specific responsibilities include, but are not limited to:

extras.title: Post Scheduling:
content: Track and manage all post schedules
Communicate and align with internal cross functional teams for launch preparation
Set up and manage dailies and cut viewing access for shows
Coordinate onboarding partners for new projects
Update and manage internal database/trackers
Manage Publicity and Marketing requests and assets
Eager to learn all the aspects of post production processes

extras.title: Content Management:
content: Set up and attend key creative approval sessions such as final dub playbacks, VFX reviews, or color correction reviews with Post Production Manager/Coordinator to learn post process
Schedule and attend Netflix screenings, previews, premieres, etc.

extras.title: Qualifications:
content: 3 years of working experience in the entertainment industry, ideally in film, studio, or production
Strong passion for post production and a fast learner who will proactively learn the post process including current trends and technology
Ability to handle a fast-paced environment supervising several projects in various points of production (from development through delivery)
Ability to respond after hours for important, timely or urgent matters
Team-player who operates in a fast-paced team-oriented setting
Ability to be discrete and maintain confidential information
Understanding of how to prioritize and respond accordingly
Willingness to learn and understand the current post process
Strong written and verbal communication skills and the ability to multitask
Proficiency in Microsoft Word, Excel, Movie Magic Budgeting, Google Docs, Google Sheets, Google Slides and Google Mail
Fluent Japanese and business level English ability
